message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the task of Textual Entailment, which is a subfield of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). However, the paper also introduces a visually-grounded version of the task, which involves the use of images, making it relevant to Computer Vision (cs.CV). The paper also uses statistical and logic-based models, which are common in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper involves the analysis of errors made by models, which is a common theme in Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
